synopsis.text: When Murai, a seemingly ordinary high school student, confesses his love for his teacher, Tanaka, he is met with a swift rejection. Tanaka, a devoted fan of otome games, has a soft spot for a particular character from her favorite game, and Murai falls short of her ideal. Determined to win her over, Murai undergoes a dramatic transformation, altering his appearance to mirror Tanaka's beloved game character. With a new hairstyle and wardrobe, Murai embarks on a mission to become Tanaka's dream man, setting the stage for a hilarious and heartwarming romantic comedy. Will Murai's efforts pay off, or will Tanaka remain captivated by the world of otome games? Only time will tell in this delightful tale of love and determination.
